item.description:
This group is dedicated to learning and experiencing techniques and strategies used to improve yourself or your skills in helping others through the use of NLP and/or Hypnosis.

It is a great place to meet other local people interested in Neuro Linguistic Programming (NLP) and Hypnosis share techniques, practice and improve skills, and have fun while doing it.

We have workshops on Hypnosis and NLP (as well as several other healing modalities like EFT and EMI) where we learn and experience techniques, strategies and applications of NLP and Hypnosis.  We currently have meetings in at least 2 venues - Methuen, and Lexington. We also partner with other meetups in central Mass and in Boston.   Check the schedule for what is coming up.

If you are looking to improve yourself or just explore some fascinating disciplines, this is the place to be.  If you are just learning or a highly experienced practitioner, this is a place to share and learn as well.  We invite people at all levels to join.

"The way in which you perceive life, determines the way in which you react to life.  It is that reaction to life that determines where and how far you go."

- Kevin A. Martin
item.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group
